Package boardModel

Class Converter

java.lang.Object
boardModel.Converter
public class Converter extends Object
Helper class
Version:
2, July 2022

Helper class which is used for example when loading a board from a file, or when determining which version of a tile / gate to display in the GUI.

Author:
Dominik Baumann

  • Constructor Details

    • Converter

      public Converter()

  • Method Details

    • getGateFromName

      public static Gate getGateFromName(String name)
      When loading a board from a file, we need to be able to convert a String representation of a gate into an actual gate.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the desired gate
      Returns:
      A new Gate object matching the name (or null if no proper name was given).

    • getGateFromType

      public static Gate getGateFromType(TileType t)
      Get the proper (unevaluated) Gate for a certain TileType.
      Parameters:
      t - Type of tile to be converted to a Gate.
      Returns:
      A Gate represented by the input type.

    • getTypeFromGate

      public static TileType getTypeFromGate(Gate gate)
      Uses:

      For computing valid input / output positions and connection lines, it is necessary to know the type of Gate.

      The GUI needs to know which version of a tile / gate to display.

      Parameters:
      gate - A gate whose type we want to know.
      Returns:
      The type of tile representing this Gate.
